title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: So is there any Free crypto coins tokens ?Like Youtube is full of videos but non of them brought to me Free crypto.Can any legit old member enlight us here from where we get the Free crypto.We have try faucets but it's waste of time.So many newbies Also want to know how to get crypto for real ? And we want instant payments into our wallets not like the faucets doing it we have to wait month before we can withdraw 2$ into our wallets.So IS there any sure way to get some Free airdrops instant please dont suggest those here who might pay maybe not Im Looking for sure deals.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: You can't expect free crypto to come in large chunks. It doesn't exist, because people don't give money for free.You have to perform tasks to earn crypto, and faucets are one of the methods to earn crypto in small amounts by solving captchas and watching ads. It's not free anyway, because you are spending your time and effort on those tasks in order to be rewarded. Another idea is to download games apps on your smartphone which reward you for reaching certain goals and levels inside the game. These offers are part of offer-walls from faucets and pay better than the usual faucets' hourly claims.If you want to earn more, you have to work somehow to acquire money. It's suggested you study the reality of the area where you live, so you can work on something profitable and demanded by the people there.

comments.author: Fullbear2222
comments.body: Quote from: uneng on December 24, 2022, 04:54:17 PMYou can't expect free crypto to come in large chunks. It doesn't exist, because people don't give money for free.You have to perform tasks to earn crypto, and faucets are one of the methods to earn crypto in small amounts by solving captchas and watching ads. It's not free anyway, because you are spending your time and effort on those tasks in order to be rewarded. Another idea is to download games apps on your smartphone which reward you for reaching certain goals and levels inside the game. These offers are part of offer-walls from faucets and pay better than the usual faucets' hourly claims.If you want to earn more, you have to work somehow to acquire money. It's suggested you study the reality of the area where you live, so you can work on something profitable and demanded by the people there.Ok i can perform the tasks If i can earn enough but where is the real websites too much talking but need action and results not just promeses.Any referal kind of projects If we can get little as 50$ daily it's good for start.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: On the Bounties(Altcoins) (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=238.0), you'll see a bunch of airdrops and they're free tokens. Yes, they're for free but the value of it, while it's not yet launched, is unknown.You're lucky if some sort of value was out of it and you're holding that token then, it's up to you if you want to hold it because most people would do upon receiving it is to dump it asap.

comments.author: mdzahed134
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 24, 2022, 04:44:31 PMAnd we want instant payments into our wallets not like the faucets doing it we have to wait month before we can withdraw 2$ into our wallets.So IS there any sure way to get some Free airdrops instant please dont suggest those here who might pay maybe not Im Looking for sure deals.Instant payments even free crypto? no way to get instant payments even in the airdrops or bounty campaigns because they will distribute coins when the campaign will be ended then you have to wait to listed on the exchanges. Still so many legit faucets i have seen even they will pay daily/weekly/monthly but very low rewards.

comments.author: maikrothaman
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 24, 2022, 04:44:31 PMSo is there any Free crypto coins tokens ?Like Youtube is full of videos but non of them brought to me Free crypto.Can any legit old member enlight us here from where we get the Free crypto.We have try faucets but it's waste of time.So many newbies Also want to know how to get crypto for real ? And we want instant payments into our wallets not like the faucets doing it we have to wait month before we can withdraw 2$ into our wallets.So IS there any sure way to get some Free airdrops instant please dont suggest those here who might pay maybe not Im Looking for sure deals.Free is an illogical concept. There is a catch everywhere. Even Bitcoin mining is not free. Someone must pay hard cash to purchase your thing in order for it to gain value.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 24, 2022, 05:01:54 PMOk i can perform the tasks If i can earn enough but where is the real websites too much talking but need action and results not just promeses.Any referal kind of projects If we can get little as 50$ daily it's good for start.In general terms you are just talking about making money online, and while there are many promises out there about methods which will allow you to make a lot of money without doing anything, anyone that has tried to do something like this knows how difficult it can be, so in my opinion you are expecting too much out of this market, as I doubt there are enough legitimate bounties out there which could allow you to earn 50 dollars per day.

comments.author: Oceat
comments.body: Beware of asking for free because it might cost you too much or something before you knew it you are paying already that supposed to be free. If you want those free coins the internet is your friend but not all free can be use to make money because most of the time those who got free are stacking garbage and shit coins/tokens on their wallet.But if it's Bitcoin there are faucet out there that you can actually earn a BTC but it takes a lot of time to earn and make some money.

comments.author: Anonylz
comments.body: Why don't you join airdrop or join testnet campaigns to get free tokens. Although, the are not exactly completely free because you get to do a bit of task to to be qualified. Hope you also know that most free tokens are not worth anything and may probably never worth anything. Better you follow projects you can offer your services inreturn for a free tokens

comments.author: albon
comments.created_time: December 24, 2022, 08:18:26 PMLast edit: December 24, 2022, 08:35:06 PM by albon
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 24, 2022, 04:44:31 PMSo is there any Free crypto coins tokens ?Like Youtube is full of videos but non of them brought to me Free crypto.Can any legit old member enlight us here from where we get the Free crypto.We have try faucets but it's waste of time.So many newbies Also want to know how to get crypto for real ? And we want instant payments into our wallets not like the faucets doing it we have to wait month before we can withdraw 2$ into our wallets.So IS there any sure way to get some Free airdrops instant please dont suggest those here who might pay maybe not Im Looking for sure deals.Yes, the faucets are a waste of time and there are many applications on Google Play that give you free crypto, but you have to watch a lot of annoying ads and do a lot of tasks to finally get a few cents. If you want free crypto coins, I advise you to work in bounties campaigns for one of the trusted managers in the forum, but you must have social media accounts that contain many real followers, and the work may continue for weeks. There are also freelancing sites for microservices that pay you in crypto by doing simple tasks that do not take much time, and within a week you can get between 5-10 dollars, You can do your research. And good luck

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Are you hindered physically in anyway? Or there are some other things you would like to mention limiting you? If not I don’t see any reason you would be asking for free coins.I have seen those with such hopes about earning free coins and it’s not a good outcome for them they always get used and it’s either the get their money scammed off them or they get used to give those fake projects claiming to offer free coin non paid promotion.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: If we talk free, There are free crypto of course but that doesn't mean it has a value that will make you want more of that free stuff. There are still airdrops existing but worthy airdrops today do have requirements to do in order to be eligible to them. The easier you get is the worthless it could be. Don't expect that you will get rich in those free crypto. It would be better to offer your skills and try to work so that you can buy crypto and earn crypto from there. Chasing free money is a waste of time, You will end up losing your valuable time in exchange of some pennies.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Actually, free crypto is possible but don't expect it to be a decent amount or you can take it right away. If you really want to know if it is possible then try going to freebitco.in to earn free crypto and withdraw the Crypto once you reach the minimum withdrawal amount. Anyway, that's just an example where you can get free crypto and there are others as well like airdrops which is trending before and many more. Most of it is that you have to work for it and that's why finding a free crypto is not what you should do as some people make a platform that says free crypto and get scammed in the end.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 24, 2022, 04:44:31 PMSo IS there any sure way to get some Free airdrops instant please dont suggest those here who might pay maybe not Im Looking for sure deals.Most of the bounty today requires a little action before you qualified for the airdrop and you have to be more active so you can have the chance of getting more airdrop. There’s no instant free money here, good bounties always take time and requires a lot of work, if you want to get some the try to visit bounty section you can see a lot of campaign there and promotions, you might find a good one.

comments.author: Marvell1
comments.body: Are you looking for free coins? As you said, it's the faucet, it's free. You can't expect a free thing to be of great value, if it were you, would you be willing to give someone a large amount of money without thinking? I bet even you wouldn't want to do that. So stop thinking that the crypto market is a place to give free or make money very easily, there is no such thing as a free lunch. It's the same in life outside, if you want to earn money, you have to work, no one gives money without asking and in the internet world too, to make money, you need to work hard.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: There is no such thing as free beer I would say but you need to work for it,you can do bounties here in the bounties section of the alternate cryptocurrencies,you can use telegram to find some coins official channels,not well known ones,those usually do give you free airdrops but be aware of the extreme high activity of scammers in telegram and do your own research.You can also check the reddit channels of the coins you are interested in but what you are asking is difficult,you want instant rewards and substantial ones,I am afraid this does not exist yet.There are some captcha sites which if you google them,if you work for them and have time daily you can earn decent amount of crypto now that we are in crypto winter for example,1 dollar which is the minimum payout to such sites which you can get it daily if you put in enough time in Litecoin for example is like 0.017 Litecoin so it all depends on what you want to do.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: crzy on December 24, 2022, 09:39:07 PMQuote from: Fullbear2222 on December 24, 2022, 04:44:31 PMSo IS there any sure way to get some Free airdrops instant please dont suggest those here who might pay maybe not Im Looking for sure deals.Most of the bounty today requires a little action before you qualified for the airdrop and you have to be more active so you can have the chance of getting more airdrop. There’s no instant free money here, good bounties always take time and requires a lot of work, if you want to get some the try to visit bounty section you can see a lot of campaign there and promotions, you might find a good one.^Airdrop and faucets now are totally wasting of time and I don't think they are reliable for micro earning.Not like before as I remember back in 2017, an airdrop is very profitable when it will be listed on an exchange but as of now, it changed, and usually they become scams or do such shady activity. It is better not to continue what you are planning now because you are just wasting your time, instead, look and find a way how to work with crypto and earn it. However, you can still earn but not decent if you are willing to exchange your time for a small amount of BTC that you will get. I rather work as a freelancer than do that, there are too many how to work and earn crypto via your skills and knowledge.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 24, 2022, 05:01:54 PMOk i can perform the tasks If i can earn enough but where is the real websites too much talking but need action and results not just promeses.Any referal kind of projects If we can get little as 50$ daily it's good for start.There isn't such websites where you can earn 50$ daily. With some luck you can earn 5$ daily or so, but that is working all day long in determined tasks like downloading games from Offer-Toro in offer-walls and completing the required goals. The best site where you can do this is through Cointiply, as far as I know.Besides that you will find the bounty campaigns, but in my opinion they are even worse, because you don't know how much you are being paid for completing tasks, since they pay you in unknown tokens that sometimes don't even have a price or an exchange where you can sell them.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Where I come from free usually means worthless. Would you be interested in worthless crypto coins and tokens? Of course not. You want something that has real value and can be used for something, right? Well, that is the same thing when it comes to free cryptocurrency airdrops. They are not worth much because there are so many of them out there and they do not have any real value.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Every day there are a lot of different drops, draws and tasks that can give you some free cryptocurrency. For example, on DropsEarn site such events take place every day. Participate and choose the most interesting drops. Do not try to search for free cryptocurrency in bounty section on forum, it's all useless and just waste your time. Generally, collecting free cryptocurrency is relevant during the bull run. Now is the crypto winter and you are unlikely to find something with generous payouts.
